Articles.Content:
This ship is really cool (If i do say so myself) There are still some bugs to work out in it, But right now it is already looking good.

REQUIRES: BDarmory, KSP version 0.90 (Uses the Mk3 parts)

![0guBQly.png](http://i.imgur.com/0guBQly.png)

Not the best pic i know, But when i can i will send you a better one.

[http://www./download/tjrbbxe3vdw6gql/Battleship_Hadius.craft](http://www./download/tjrbbxe3vdw6gql/Battleship_Hadius.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-06T20:16:32Z" title="04/06/2015 08:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 6, 2015</time> by daniel l.**
DL link? I would like to take this thing for a spin myself.

> DL link? I would like to take this thing for a spin myself.
